mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_items (orders_id, item_id, item_name, product_price, quantity) VALUES (#{ordersId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT oi.* FROM order_items oi JOIN items i ON oi.item_id = i.id WHERE i.category_id = #{categoryId}

SELECT oi.id, oi.orders_id, oi.item_id, oi.item_name, oi.product_price, oi.quantity, (SELECT ii.url FROM items_image ii WHERE ii.items_id = oi.item_id LIMIT 1) AS image_url FROM order_items oi WHERE oi.orders_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE order_items SET orders_id = #{ordersId}, item_id = #{itemId}, item_name = #{itemName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
